nano.remexp.broadcaster
Class StreamPipe

java.lang.Object
  nano.remexp.ThreadHandler
      nano.remexp.broadcaster.StreamPipe
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class StreamPipe
extends ThreadHandler

The StreamPipe is the stream broadcaster of the stream data input from the remote experiment to the client sockets that receive the stream data.

Version:
1.1 23.08.2012
Author:
Dominic Bosch

Constructor Summary
StreamPipe(java.io.PipedInputStream src)
          Instantiates an object of this class and starts a thread that reads the input of the pipe continuously.
 
Method Summary
 void doTask()
          The loop that passes stream data from the pipe to the client stream sockets
protected  void plugStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)
          When a new stream socket is connected it is added to the internal storage.
protected  void removeStreamSocket(StreamSocket sock)
          When a stream socket is closed it is removed from the internal storage.
 void shutDown()
          Shutting down all stream sockets and this thread.

StreamPipe

public StreamPipe(java.io.PipedInputStream src)
Instantiates an object of this class and starts a thread that reads the input of the pipe continuously.
